name: electronics-store_get_all_products
description:
Get all products, optionally filtered by category.

Args:
    category: Filter by category (TVs, Phones, Laptops, Smart Home, Audio)
    limit: Maximum number of products to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of products with basic information

name: electronics-store_get_product_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific product.

Args:
    product_id: The unique ID of the product (e.g., "TV001")

Returns:
    Product details including specifications, warranty info, and price match eligibility

name: electronics-store_search_products
description:
Search products with multiple filters.

Args:
    query: Search term to match against name, description, brand
    category: Filter by category (TVs, Phones, Laptops, Smart Home, Audio)
    brand: Filter by brand (Samsung, Apple, Sony, etc.)
    min_price: Minimum price filter
    max_price: Maximum price filter
    in_stock_only: Only show products that are in stock
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching products

name: electronics-store_get_categories
description:
Get all available product categories.

Returns:
    List of unique categories

name: electronics-store_get_brands
description:
Get all available brands.

Returns:
    List of unique brands

name: electronics-store_check_price_match
description:
Check if a product is eligible for price matching.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to check
    competitor_price: The competitor's price
    competitor_name: Name of the competitor (e.g., "Amazon", "Walmart")

Returns:
    Price match eligibility and potential savings

name: electronics-store_request_price_match
description:
Request a price match for a product.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to price match
    competitor_price: The competitor's lower price
    competitor_name: Name of the competitor

Returns:
    Price match confirmation with savings amount

name: electronics-store_get_warranty_options
description:
Get available extended warranty options for a product.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to get warranty options for

Returns:
    List of available warranty plans with pricing and coverage details

name: electronics-store_add_to_cart
description:
Add a product to the shopping cart.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to add
    quantity: Number of units to add (default 1)
    warranty_id: Optional extended warranty ID to add

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: electronics-store_get_cart
description:
Get the current shopping cart contents.

Returns:
    Cart items with quantities, prices, warranties, and subtotal

name: electronics-store_remove_from_cart
description:
Remove an item from the cart.

Args:
    cart_item_id: The cart item ID to remove

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: electronics-store_clear_cart
description:
Clear all items from the shopping cart.

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: electronics-store_checkout
description:
Complete the purchase of items in the cart.

Creates an order and clears the cart. Uses the user's default shipping address.

Returns:
    Order confirmation with order ID and total

name: electronics-store_get_purchase_history
description:
Get the current user's purchase history.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of orders to return (default 20)

Returns:
    List of past orders with items and totals

name: electronics-store_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in user's profile information.

Returns:
    User profile with user_id, name, email, phone, and default_address
